name: Seul
description:
My first ever game jam attempt, made in under 48 hours.
Made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam and based around the theme of "Only One".

Top-down, bullet-hell, dungeon crawler style game - except that you can only shoot one bullet at a time. Aim carefully.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move around
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left mouse button to shoot
